content.rendered:
Tekken 3

Description

Tekken 3 is a well-known PlayStation game now available on PC as well. Pick your favorite character and get ready to fight to the last drop of blood. Each character is different as they can perform unique moves.

You have quite a few options of modes to choose from: Arcade, Versus, Team Battle, Time Attack, Tekken Force and Practice.

At the beginning some characters are locked and you can unlock them by completing the individual story/arcade mode.

How to Play Tekken 3

Go to “Controls Settings” and you’ll find the controls of every player.

Developer

Tekken 3 is developed by Namco.

Gameplay
